#summary How to import GAC-80K or other mindpixel text files into the database

In order to initially create the database tables you may initially need to [AddMindpixels add a test mindpixel], then [HowToCreateMySQLDatabase empty the tables].

To import a text file containing mindpixels, use the mpcreate utility as follows:

{{{
    mpcreate.exe -load /usr/bin/mindpixels.txt
}}}
